name: RoadKill
overview: RoadKill lets players fight it out on the go in a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a plague and ruled by gangs. Players get behind the controls of 30 vehicles with weapons such as machine-guns, guided missiles and grenade launchers destroying enemy gangs and building a gang of their own to take control of roads of this abysmal world. The game offers 30 core missions with plenty of side missions, 30 vehicles armed with a variety of weapons, combat against vehicles, armed pedestrians and stationary targets, and a reputation system that slowly raises your status and enables you to create a gang of thugs. Players can also unlock secret items that can be used to soup up vehicles, and 2-4 player split-screen multiplayer modes for when you're finished with the single player
